## utils.string namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [commonWordPrefix(array, opt\_shortest)](./blockly.utils_namespace.string_namespace.commonwordprefix_1_function.md) | Given an array of strings, return the length of the common prefix. Words may not be split. Any space after a word is included in the length. |
|  [commonWordSuffix(array, opt\_shortest)](./blockly.utils_namespace.string_namespace.commonwordsuffix_1_function.md) | Given an array of strings, return the length of the common suffix. Words may not be split. Any space after a word is included in the length. |
|  [isNumber(str)](./blockly.utils_namespace.string_namespace.isnumber_1_function.md) | Is the given string a number (includes negative and decimals). |
|  [shortestStringLength(array)](./blockly.utils_namespace.string_namespace.shorteststringlength_1_function.md) | Given an array of strings, return the length of the shortest one. |
|  [wrap(text, limit)](./blockly.utils_namespace.string_namespace.wrap_1_function.md) | Wrap text to the specified width. |
